original_title: Bob Birdnow's Remarkable Tale of Human Survival and the Transcendence of Self
overview: When invited by an old friend to speak to a struggling sales team at a conference, Bob Birdnow reluctantly agrees. Bob's attempt to say something motivational takes an unexpected turn when, forced off script and desperate, he begins the one story he'd hoped he'd never have to tell.
title: Bob Birdnow's Remarkable Tale of Human Survival and the Transcendence of Self
